Accuracy metrics .We used two classification accuracy metrics : the proportion of correct classifications ( PCC ) and relative classifier information ( RCI ) .The first is easy to interpret and simplifies statistical testing , but is sensitive to the prior class probabilities and does not fully describe the actual difficulty of the classification problem .
